long_description: Featuring a rope strap, ice-axe loops and a top pocket big enough for most climbing helmets, the Mountain Hardwear Hueco 35 climbing pack holds everything you need for the crag. Dual-density shoulder straps carry in comfort; stowable webbing belt adds stability when needed. HardWave suspension conforms comfortably to the curve of your back and distributes weight evenly. Large zip-top opening provides easy access into main compartment. Interior sleeve fits a hydration reservoir (sold separately), guide book or iPad/tablet. Stowable rope strap deploys when needed and hides away when not. Reinforced grab handle helps ensure safe hauling when needed. Side compression straps on the Mountain Hardwear Hueco 35 pack help keep any size load stable.
short_description: Featuring a rope strap, ice-axe loops and a top pocket big enough for most climbing helmets, the Mountain Hardwear Hueco 35 climbing pack holds everything you need for the crag.
